extendedInfo.description: Welcome to Mountain Craft Classes, Appalachian Music Lessons, Historical Walks, and Hikes through our Bounty of Wilderness. Experience West Virginia is a new initiative that celebrates Appalachia. Whether you are familiar with mountain culture or just learning about us, you're sure to find something of interest in the many events we've created. The agenda is chock full of exciting offerings.  We invite you to take time to review all of our entertaining and educational programming and enroll in as many workshops as you'd like.  Above all else, we look forward to giving you a taste of West Virginia! Join us in Making Mountain Memories!
